title: Dinnerbone:将来或可将Mojang账户关联到Twitch账户
author: a20001017
txt_content:
本帖最后由 a20001017 于 2013-11-19 20:07 编辑 
请先了解：
Minecraft PC/Mac版将嵌入Twitch直播功能


Dinnerbone:We're hoping to have a first test build out very soon, but you can get a head start by connecting to twitch now! https://account.mojang.com/me/settings 


Dinnerbone:最近我们希望测试第一个测试版，但是你现在就能抢线尝(关)试(联)连接到Twitch账户！


理解：与在直播下评论有关？
